title: "Judge pares down artists' AI copyright lawsuit against Midjourney, Stability AI"
excerpt: "A judge in California federal court on Monday trimmed a lawsuit by visual artists who accuse Stability AI, Midjourney and DeviantArt of misusing their copyrighted work in connection with the companies' generative artificial intelligence systems."
